name: The Fifth Exponent
description:
Embark on this ridiculous adventure in space where cars only travel by discrete exponential distances. 

You'll need to load the correct exponent if you want to arrive at your destination.  When you arrive on an island, just Point & Click!

And if you run out of Exponents you will need to restart.

------------------

This game isn't finished. I'm working on a polished version which will be ready somwhere in 2018 so please stay tuned!

--------------------

Made for Ludum Dare 39 in 72 hours, the game is very rough around the edges. There's no sound whatsoever and unfortunately I didn't have time to implement time-rewind nor in-game hints, there are also some game breaking bugs... Also the nature of the game requires that you will probably need to restart it a few times. Unfortunately you'll need to to do it manually by restarting the game. I'm sorry for the inconvenience! All of that will be corrected/added in the post-jam version which is comming...

In the meantime, if you're stuck, check out the spoiler free hints & complete walkthrough that you can find here.
